General.Name: Wuxi Delinhai Environmental Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Wuxi Delinhai Environmental Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the cyanobacteria treatment technology business in China. It is also involved in treatment business of small and medium-sized lakes for improving water quality services, as well as prevents and control of cyanobacteria blooms. Wuxi Delinhai Environmental Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2009 and is based in Wuxi, China.
